backend/main.mo: Backend actor managing user profiles, access control, and CoinGecko API fetch functions including admin-only debug endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a documentation feature to its files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all frontend files and their roles in the app.
frontend/docs/coingecko-debug-dfx.md: Developer guide explaining how to deploy and test raw CoinGecko API responses using the debug function via dfx.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the frontend and loading the main TypeScript application bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component handling identity bootstrapping, routing, profile setup, and authenticated view rendering.
Dialog component showing a notice that crypto watchlist functionality is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/BackendTesterEnt: UI control for opening the Backend Tester with permission-aware states for admins and non-admin users.
frontend/src/components/ConfigErrorBound: Empty placeholder file intended for future error boundary implementation.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionBootst: Wrapper handling actor initialization, authentication retries, timeouts, and connection error states before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionDetail: Displays expandable debug info about authentication, actor status, admin initialization, and errors, with a copy-to-clipboard option.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionRecove: Empty file or placeholder with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/CryptoCard.tsx: Renders a crypto summary card using mock data with price, market cap, and change, and opens a detail dialog on interaction.
frontend/src/components/CryptoDetailDial: Dialog showing chart and settings tabs for crypto analysis, managing forecast-related local state.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays site footer with attribution and a crypto risk disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/ForecastChart.ts: Generates mock historical data and forecasts using linear regression and moving averages, rendering them in a Recharts line chart.
frontend/src/components/ForecastSettings: Provides sliders to adjust moving-average period and forecast horizon for the chartâ€™s prediction settings.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling theme toggle, authentication, user registration, and optional backend tester navigation.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Displays a login prompt with feature cards and a button that initiates Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/PriceEntryManage: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal allowing users to enter and save their name using a backend mutation with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/SimulatedBashPan: Interactive terminal-like panel that runs backend commands, manages reconnection logic, admin access, and auto-scrolling output.
frontend/src/components/WatchlistManager: UI card for managing a crypto watchlist, currently showing a demo-mode alert due to missing backend support.
frontend/src/components/WatchlistPriceTi: Card showing real-time price tick section with a demo-mode alert indicating backend is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorEnhanced.ts: Enhanced actor hook adding diagnostics, timeout handling, admin-init tracking, and retry mechanisms for authentication issues.
frontend/src/hooks/useConnectionRecovery: Empty hook file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login flow, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profile, admin checks, registration stubs, and placeholder crypto data queries using an actor-based backend interface.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/BackendTesterPage.tsx: Renders an admin-focused diagnostics and backend testing interface with permission checks and identity details.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays the main dashboard with watchlist management, price tickers, and popular crypto cards.
frontend/src/utils/backendTesterCommands: Defines command metadata and demo-mode implementations for backend tester features like market data and symbol management.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-based values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for a crypto backend canister and frontend, including feature requests, known issues, and required Motoko debug endpoints for CoinGecko HTTP outcalls.
